ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller

Class ProjectController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller.ProjectController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200")
public class ProjectController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles HTTP requests for Project objects in the ProjectTOMi system.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Karol Talbot

    • Method Detail

      • getProject

        @GetMapping(value="/projects/{id}")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<Project> getProject(@PathVariable
                                                                                                     java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                     @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                     ProjectAuthManager authMan)
        Returns a resource representing the requested Project to the source of a GET request to /projects/id.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier for the Project
        Returns:
        Resource representing the Project object.

      • getActiveProjects

        @GetMapping(value="/projects")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resources<org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<Project>> getActiveProjects(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                              ProjectAuthManager authMan)
        Returns a collection of all active Project the source of a GET request to /projects.
        Returns:
        Collection of resources representing all active Projects

      • createProject

        @PostMapping(value="/projects")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createProject(@RequestBody
                                                                                                 Project newProject)
                                                                                          throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates a new Project with the attributes provided in the POST request to /projects.
        Parameters:
        newProject - an Project object with required information.
        Returns:
        response containing links to the newly created Project
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when the created URI is unable to be parsed

      • updateProject

        @PutMapping(value="/projects/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateProject(@PathVariable
                                                                                                     java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                     @RequestBody
                                                                                                     Project newProject,
                                                                                                     @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                     ProjectAuthManager authMan)
                                                                                              throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Updates the attributes for a Project with the provided id with the attributes provided in the PUT request to /projects/id.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the Project to be updated
        newProject - the updated Project
        Returns:
        response containing a link to the updated Project
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when the created URI is unable to be parsed

      • setProjectInactive

        @DeleteMapping(value="/projects/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> setProjectInactive(@PathVariable
                                                                                                             java.lang.String id)
        Sets the requested Project's active attribute false, removing it from the list of active Projects. Responds to the DELETE requests to /projects/id.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the Project to be set inactive
        Returns:
        a response without any content
